item.title: Ukraine says 'understanding' reached with US on peace plan, as Trump says his envoy will meet Putin
item.description: President Trump says the original peace plan has been "fine-tuned", and that he will send his envoy Steve Witkoff to Moscow.

item.title: Who is Trump's 'drone guy' Dan Driscoll, taking key role in Ukraine talks?
item.description: The youngest-ever US army secretary has been thrust into the spotlight as the face of renewed efforts to end the years-long war.

item.title: Catholic bishop hits out at Nigeria's failure to rescue abducted schoolchildren
item.description: The police deny little is being done to find the 250 pupils and accuses the school of not co-operating.

item.title: Trump envoy denies bias as he pushes for Sudan peace plan
item.description: Efforts to negotiate an end to the war, which has displaced 12 million people, remain unfruitful.

item.title: Ex-wife of Dubai royal says she fears arrest as custody battle escalates
item.description: Zeynab Javadli's ex-husband has lodged a criminal complaint with Dubai police, accusing her of kidnapping their three daughters.
